<<<<<<< HEAD
The loyal man's letany: or a prayer against faction, this present time of Lent.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
printed by George Croom, at the sign of the Blue-Ball in Thames-street, over against Baynard's-Castle, London : 1685.
Caption title. Verse: "From a presbyters zeal, and the faith of a Scot,". Reproduction of original in the British Library.
